scripts.build: pkg . --out-path ..\release_dbassistant -t node10-win-x64,node10-macos-x64 && copy changelog.md ..\release_dbassistant\changelog.md && move ..\release_dbassistant\dbassistant-win.exe ..\release_dbassistant\dbassistant.exe && move ..\release_dbassistant\dbassistant-macos ..\release_dbassistant\dbassistant
